bugs.title: CVE-2019-17056 kernel: privilege escalation in llcp_sock_create in net/nfc/llcp_sock.c in the AF_NFC network module [fedora-all]

comment.text: Works for me. No regressions noted compared to previous version.
Tested on a variety of arm and aarch64 hardware, no issues.
